markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Poison Barbs Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1512)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 79</row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You set several barbed animal spines or wooden stakes in the ground, each tipped with poison from a venomous animal or toxic plant. The snare deals 1d4 piercing damage to the first creature to enter its square (DC 15 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a failed save, several barbs lodge in the creature's feet. For 1 minute (or until a creature or an ally spends three Interact actions to remove the barbs), the barbs deal 1d4 poison damage to the creature each time it Strides more than half its Speed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Poison Barbs Snare
